'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack''''' is an album comprising of the soundtrack from the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. It was released [[10 December]] [[2002]]. An extended soundtrack, based on the extended edition of the film, was later released as ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - The Complete Recordings]]''.
